alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Otsego; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 04 at 3:06AM EST until February 04 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Bradford county. In New York, Otsego, Chenango, Chemung, Tioga and Broome counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact this morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The wintry mix of rain, sleet, freezing rain will continue to change to all snow from northwest to southeast early this morning. Ice accretion is most likely at elevations above 1400 feet.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission strongly encourage motorist to heed all travel restrictions and delay unnecessary travel. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways, and traffic conditions.
